name: libdmx
description:
libdmx - X Window System DMX (Distributed Multihead X) extension
library.

dependencies.name: libx11
dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.

dependencies.name: libxext
dependencies.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.

dependencies.name: dmxproto
dependencies.description:
Distributed Multihead X (DMX) Extension. This extension defines a
protocol for clients to access a front-end proxy X server that controls
multiple back-end X servers making up a large display.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: util-macros
dependencies.description:
This is a set of autoconf macros used by the configure.ac scripts in
other Xorg modular packages, and is needed to generate new versions of
their configure scripts with autoconf.

dependent_to.name: nfs-utils
dependent_to.description:
The NFS Utilities package contains the userspace server and client tools
necessary to use the kernel's NFS abilities. NFS is a protocol that
allows sharing file systems over the network.
